## Feature Request

### Proposal

What do you want to propose as a feature? Is there something missing? A function that could work better? 

### Suggested implementation

How do you want to see this implemented? As an API? A new GUI function? Something else?

### Context & Screenshots

Add any supporting context, examples, or screenshots that help explain the request.
